alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:39PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 515 PM MDT... At 437 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Montello to 25 miles south of Park Valley to 10 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway to 22 miles southwest of Corinne. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Howell, Park Valley, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Etna, Locomotive Springs, Promontory, Grouse Creek, Lynn, Lucin, Rosette and Golden Spike Historic Site. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 near mile marker 16, and between mile markers 19 and 28. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 1 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
